pages.index: Royal Mirage Resort - Your Oasis of Luxury and Excitement in Malta 18+ Main Casino Rooms Bars Spa Welcome to Royal Mirage Resort Discover unparalleled luxury and endless excitement at our premier resort in the heart of Malta. Your unforgettable escape starts here. Explore Our Rooms Discover the variety of luxurious accommodations we offer at Royal Mirage Resort. Whether you are looking for a cozy room or a spacious suite, we have the perfect space for you. Standard Room Comfortable and well-appointed, our standard rooms offer all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay. Deluxe Room Our deluxe rooms provide extra space and luxury, perfect for those seeking a bit more comfort. Suite Experience ultimate luxury in our suites, featuring separate living areas and premium amenities. Get a reserve About Royal Mirage Resort Royal Mirage Resort has been a beacon of luxury and hospitality since its inception. Learn about our journey and how we became one of the most sought-after destinations in Malta. Our History Founded in 2014, Royal Mirage Resort started as a small boutique hotel and has grown into a luxurious resort known for its exceptional service and amenities. Over the years, we have continuously evolved, adding new features and services to enhance the guest experience. In the early days, our founders were driven by a passion for creating a unique and memorable experience for every guest. Their vision was to blend the rich cultural heritage of Malta with modern luxury, offering a haven of tranquility and elegance. This vision has been the cornerstone of our success, attracting guests from all over the world. As we expanded, we introduced a variety of amenities, including world-class dining options, a state-of-the-art spa, and exclusive entertainment venues. Each addition was carefully designed to complement the resort's overall ambiance and provide guests with an unparalleled experience. Our commitment to quality and attention to detail has earned us numerous awards and accolades in the hospitality industry. Today, Royal Mirage Resort stands as a testament to our dedication to excellence. We continue to innovate and improve, ensuring that our guests enjoy the highest standards of service and comfort. From our luxurious accommodations to our exceptional staff, every aspect of the resort is crafted to create unforgettable memories. Join us and become a part of our storied legacy, where luxury meets heritage in perfect harmony. Why Choose Us At Royal Mirage Resort, we strive to provide our guests with unparalleled service and amenities. Here are some reasons why our guests keep coming back. Luxurious Accommodations Our rooms and suites are designed with your comfort in mind, offering elegant decor and premium amenities. World-Class Dining Enjoy gourmet meals prepared by our talented chefs at our diverse selection of restaurants and bars. Exceptional Service Our dedicated staff is here to ensure that every aspect of your stay is perfect, from check-in to check-out. Entertainment and Relaxation Whether you want to relax in our spa or enjoy the excitement of our casino, we have something for everyone. Guest Reviews Don't just take our word for it. See what our guests have to say about their experiences at Royal Mirage Resort. "An unforgettable experience! The service was exceptional and the amenities were top-notch. I can't wait to come back." - John D. "Royal Mirage Resort exceeded all my expectations. The rooms were luxurious and the dining was superb." - Sarah P. "A perfect blend of relaxation and excitement. The spa was incredibly rejuvenating and the casino offered endless entertainment." - Michael R. Our Philosophy At Royal Mirage Resort, our philosophy is centered around providing an exceptional experience for our guests. We believe in creating a welcoming and luxurious environment where every guest feels valued and pampered. From the moment you arrive, our team is dedicated to ensuring your stay is nothing short of perfect. We strive to exceed your expectations through attention to detail, personalized service, and a commitment to excellence. Join us at Royal Mirage Resort and discover a place where luxury meets comfort, and every moment is a cherished memory. Get in Touch with Us Whether you have a question, need assistance, or want to learn more about our resort, we're here to help. Please fill out the form below and a member of our team will get back to you shortly. pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - Royal Mirage Resort 18+ Main Casino Rooms Bars Spa Privacy Policy 1. Introduction Welcome to Royal Mirage Resort. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you visit our website or use our services. 2. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you provide to us directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details. We also collect information automatically, such as your IP address, browser type, and usage data. 3. How We Use Your Information We use your information to provide and improve our services, process your bookings, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our website. We may also use your data for marketing purposes with your consent. 4. Sharing Your Information We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your data with trusted partners and service providers who assist us in operating our website and delivering our services. These third parties are bound by confidentiality agreements. 5. Data Security We implement a variety of security measures to protect your personal data. Our website uses encryption to safeguard your information during transmission, and we have strict internal policies to prevent unauthorized access. 6. Cookies Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device that help us understand how you use our site and improve its functionality. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. 7. Your Rights You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can also object to or restrict the processing of your data and request data portability. To exercise these rights, please contact us at royalmirage@gmail.com. 8. Children's Privacy Our services are not directed at children under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently received information from a child, we will delete it immediately. 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we will notify you of significant changes via email or a prominent notice on our website. 10. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these sites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any external sites you visit. 11. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at royalmirage@gmail.com. We will respond to your inquiries promptly. 12. Data Retention We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. When we no longer need your information, we will securely delete or anonymize it. 13. International Data Transfers Your personal data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own. We take steps to ensure that your information receives the same level of protection as it would within your country. 14. Consent By using our website and services, you consent to the collection, use, and sharing of your information as described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with our practices, please do not use our site. 15. Legal Basis for Processing We process your personal data based on various legal grounds, including your consent, the necessity to provide our services, compliance with legal obligations, and our legitimate interests in maintaining the security and functionality of our website. +356 2122 5241 royalmirage@gmail.com The Mall FRN1478, Floriana Casino Rooms & Suites Dining & Bars Spa & Entertainment Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions Our website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience. By using our site, you agree to our Privacy Policy. Accept
